author: CoffeeBrickMan
title: Quick Mini Review
review:
Snoof is the third of the Series 5 Mixels of the Frosticons Tribe.

Moderate articulation, but enough for a few different poses, and even with the white dots for 'teeth' instead of some of the toothy parts, he still manages a fun cheeky expression.

Lots of blue and medium azure bow/slope pieces, including the long curved feet, and those ice swords for a tail.

Quick build time 3 minutes.

This guys body geometry limits his articulation, which doesn't bother me as much as it would for a standing figure. He's a fun addition to the tribe.

Frosticons Max

This Max (a combination of the 3 members of the tribe) is really brilliant. Fantastic articulation with the multi segment arms, and clip fingers on the hands which each hold a flick missile. His big feet give him excellent stability, and lots of teeth and a ball&socket articulated head allow for great expression.

One of my favourite Max's

Quick build time just over 10 minutes, and not too many parts left over.
